summary: **Resident Evil 4** is a popular horror game where you play as Leon Kennedy, rescuing the President's daughter from a Spanish cult. The game has exciting action and a new way of looking at the world compared to older games in the series. It was in development for a long time, with many changes, before it finally came out in 2005. People loved it for its story, gameplay, and characters. It won many awards and influenced other games with its unique camera view. A remake came out in 2023.
title: Resident Evil 4
